import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contact', templateUrl: './contact.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact.component.css'] }) export class ContactComponent { }
Contact us

We'll be in touch

If you have any suggestions or questions, you can always contact us

24/7 Customer Support
Our Help Center is always open for business. But if you can’t find what you’re looking for, connect with our friendly folks at ProHealth@gmail.com
Ask us anything
We’re always excited to talk to amazing people and awesome hospitals. Tell us your thoughts and let's chat.
Talk to us
Wondering if MedCare is right for your business? Reach out to our sales team for expert advice and transparent pricing before you buy.
